snippet: People recovering from meningitis in a national outbreak are now being diagnosed with epidural abscesses.
abstract: People recovering from meningitis in national outbreak caused by contaminated steroid drug made by New England Compounding Center are struck by second illness; new problem, called epidural abscess, is infection near spine at site where drug was injected to treat back or neck pain.
lead_paragraph: People recovering from meningitis in a national outbreak are now being diagnosed with epidural abscesses.

headline.main: Second Illness Is Infecting Those Struck by Meningitis
headline.print_headline: Second Illness Is Infecting Those Struck By Meningitis
